extension.description: This provider allows to choose the quality of video torrent which will feed Pulsar.[CR]You need to config the add-on before using Pulsar[CR]It works with Movies and some TV Shows[CR]I won't keep your upload quota, you need to use another software.

Este proveedor proporciona la capacidad de elegir la calidad del video torrent seleccionado.[CR]Tienes que configurar el add-on antes de usar Pulsar[CR]Funciona con peliculas y series[CR]No soy responsable de la informaci칩n descargada.
extension.disclaimer: It only works with Pulsar 0.3.1![CR]It is just for educational purpose[CR]Check if it is illegal in your country to use.
Solo funciona con Pulsar 0.3.1![CR]De uso unicamente educativo[CR]Comprueba si es legal en tu pais antes de usar.
